jyothishshasthraya bohowita sathyathawa baliya haki anawaki pala kirimen walakina athara ee wenuwata asathyanaya kirima walakwiya haki anumana prakasha matha wishwasaya thabayi. [18]:48-49 shatha warsha gananawak purawata kala parikshana anuwa jyothishshasthra anumana, apekshitha ibe sidu wana siduwim walata wada wadiyen nirawadya wi natha.[2]

hasyothpadaka katha puwathakin samanwitha jaya shri amathithuma sinamapataye shriyantha mendis, tenisan kure, kusum renu, damitha aberathna, gayathri dayas, aariyasena gamage, lakshman amarasekara, di. bi. gangodathanna, shiromika pranandu athulu pirisa ranganayen dayaka wethi.

nilagama rajamaha wiharaye wathman wiharadhipathi dhuraye katayuthu karanne madahapola gunarathana himiyanya.wasara dedahasakata adhika ithihasayak athi me wiharasthanaye parani chithra ha prathimada chaithyada wadath widhimath kramawedayakata anuwa sanrakshanaya kala yuthu bawa unwahanse penwa dethi.

janapathi thomas jefarsan 1805 di ohuge dewana samarambhaya sandaha wiwrutha niwasak thaba gath athara ohuge diwrum uthsawaya sandaha aganuwarata raswu janathawa ohu pasupasin niwasatama giya athara nil kamarayedi owunta aachara karana ladi. 1829 samahara awasthawanhidi wiwrutha niwasawala mara kriya siduwu athara dhawala mandiraya thula 20000k pamana wana janathawa ohuge samarambhaka ulela samaraddi janapathi andru jaksan hata hotalayakata yamata sidu wiya.awasanayedi ohuge sahayakayanta pirisawa dodam yusha ha wiski walin piri thibu apullana baldi samaga eliyata ada damannata sidu wuni.aluthin path wunu growar klewaland sampradayaka wiwrutha niwasa idiripita wenuwata dhawala mandiraye idiri pela aasanawala sita yudha bhatayanwa janapada sammalochanayakata sakasana witada mema purudda digatama thibuni.jefarsan ee wana thekma akhandawa yudha samaye hara pawathwa gena giya aluth awurudu dinayata saha juli dahathara wana dina warshika piliganim sandaha ohuge niwasata mahajana charika walata awasara laba dunneya.ema piliganim janapathi bil klintan pranawath kirimata uthsaha kalada 1930 pera bhagayedi awasan wiya.
